# Histogram of peak fluxes from Stern+01 catalog, rebinned to avoid low number (<10) bins.
# We removed the smallest bin as it was plagued with significant uncertainties.
# Peak count rate was NOT converted to peak flux since we used the raw data from Stern+01 which is already in units of peak flux.
# The last bin ends at 50.0, and there are 26 bins.
# Nb_GRBs/year/log10(pflx) is NOT corrected for efficiency.
# 1. Peak flux (left bin edge) [ph/cm2/s]  2. Nb_GRBs  3. Error = sqrt(N)
